name: WeeklyMemoryVerse
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weekly memory verse
Developer Terms of Use
des: With this skill, Alexa will read a weekly verse and then you have the option to repeat or have the verse broken into smaller parts. Our goal is to utilize technology to educate and spread God’s word while also equipping parents with a resource to teach their children.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
